text: Sitara is a Pakistani former film actress known for her works mostly in Punjabi and Urdu cinema. ==Career== She entered the film industry in 1984 and made her debut with the Punjabi film Dil Maa Da. During her film career she appeared in 10 Urdu, 19 Punjabi and 4 Pashto films. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !#!!Year !! Title !! Language !! Director !!
